page.title: 16Williton Industrial Estate
page.content: On the outskirts of the village of Williton there is a pleasantly situated{Industrial Estate.} It is largely made up of{small businesses } housed in{purpose built}and modern single story buildings. There are a variety of companies concerned and this review is not a comprehensive list. Recently a {Cement making works}has been added to the complex. This was a{controversial decision and brought protests from a number off the nearby residents. Among the longer standing companies are{Goodlands, Coal and {Builders Merchants,}who have branches throughout West Somerset. {C.Burge}has a small but flourishing business{selling decorating materials.{Poldenvale}supply{livestock {handling equipment}to much of the U.K.
